snippet: Global powers agreed on Saturday to back a plan for political transition in Syria that did not include a specific call for President Bashar al-Assad to step down.
lead_paragraph: Global powers agreed on Saturday to back a plan for political transition in Syria that did not include a specific call for President Bashar al-Assad to step down.

headline.main: Action Group for Syria Final Communique
